import heapq

def k\_weakest\_rows(mat, k):
    nRows, nCols = len(mat), len(mat[0])
    rowSums = [[r, sum(mat[r])] for r in range(nRows)]
    heapq.heapify(rowSums)
    weakestRows = []
    for _ in range(k):
        r, s = heapq.heappop(rowSums)
        weakestRows.append(mat[r][:])
    return weakestRows
